name: RPC Interaction Example
description:
RPC Interaction Example

This example demonstrates real-time communication with the NetMagus UI using RPC (Remote Procedure Call) via WAMP.

Features demonstrated:

  • Connecting to NetMagus WAMP server
  • Sending HTML messages to the UI
  • Displaying progress updates in real-time
  • Using rpc_form_query for interactive prompts
  • Updating the UI while processing tasks
